| A miner:* can [tunnel](/wiki/Tunnel "Tunnel") through walls.
* needs a pick-axe to tunnel through walls.
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                |

The **miner** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") added in the [Convict patch](/wiki/Convict_patch "Convict patch"). Miners are [tunneling monsters](/wiki/Tunneling_monster "Tunneling monster") that need an item of the [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe") class to work. They are never randomly generated, and only appear in the [Convict quest](/wiki/Convict_quest "Convict quest").

Eight miners are generated on each lower filler level of the quest. When you first enter these levels, you get the message "This appears to be a prison level that is still under construction", making the miners the construction crews that are excavating the new levels.

The miners are generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful"), and do not seem to care about the escaped convict wandering through their workplace.

## References

Reference: [Karl Garrison's Convict Patch](http://nethack.edeca.net/karl/nethack-convict-0.7.diff)

Miner

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ miner
Difficulty 4
Attacks Weapon 1d8 physical
@ miner
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Weapon 1d8 physical

Base level 2
Base experience 22
Speed 6
Base AC 10
Base MR 10
Alignment 4 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium

A miner:

  • can tunnel through walls.
  • needs a pick-axe to tunnel through walls.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.

The miner is a monster added in the Convict patch. Miners are tunneling monsters that need an item of the pick-axe class to work. They are never randomly generated, and only appear in the Convict quest.

Eight miners are generated on each lower filler level of the quest. When you first enter these levels, you get the message "This appears to be a prison level that is still under construction", making the miners the construction crews that are excavating the new levels.

The miners are generated peaceful, and do not seem to care about the escaped convict wandering through their workplace.

References

Reference: Karl Garrison's Convict Patch

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Miner&oldid=130593"

The '''miner''' is a [[monster]] added in the [[Convict patch]]. Miners are [[tunneling monster]]s that need an item of the [[pick-axe]] class to work. They are never randomly generated, and only appear in the [[Convict quest]].

Eight miners are generated on each lower filler level of the quest. When you first enter these levels, you get the message "This appears to be a prison level that is still under construction", making the miners the construction crews that are excavating the new levels. 

The miners are generated [[peaceful]], and do not seem to care about the escaped convict wandering through their workplace.

==References==
